guidanceItem.title: Unused ports are blocked by default.
guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that unused ports are blocked by default when configuring your network firewall.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
